text: Todor Stoyanov Burmov (; 14 January 1834 â€“ 7 November 1906) was a Bulgarian politician. He was a member of the Conservative Party and the first Prime Minister of Bulgaria when it became independent, in 1879. == Other websites == * Ministry of Finance Profile Category:1834 births Category:1906 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Bulgaria Category:Uruguayan educators
